DOC.brief_title: Graft-Augmented Rectocele Repair-A Randomized Surgical Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Rectoceles may significant effect quality life woman . Symptoms associate rectocele include protrude vaginal mass , persistent pelvic pressure , sexual dysfunction . Surgical repair common treatment success rate range 65 % -85 % 1-2 year . In attempt improve surgical outcome , clinician use graft material augment weaken tissue rectocele repair : however , little data support refute practice . The purpose study estimate effect graft augmentation objective subjective outcome . Comparison : Rectocele repair without graft , compare rectocele repair SurgiSIS ( TM ) graft .
DOC.criteria: Women stage 2 great symptomatic rectocele Women elect undergo surgical rectocele repair Women age 21 year Women willing comply study procedure followup Pregnant nursing woman History porcine allergy History connective tissue disease , pelvic malignancy , pelvic radiation Women undergo concurrent sacral colpopexy
